title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; ships macOS/Linux binaries and Docker images.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK: sync/async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints; auto-pulls missing models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; promises & streams, types included.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: chat, embed, tool-calling, structured output via Ollama local endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, multi-user, RAG, file upload, dark mode); drop-in replacement for ChatGPT-UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included); sync/async, streaming, Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI for browsing, pulling and chatting with local models; fuzzy finder, keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline Copilot (FIM completions, custom prompts).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: generator, embedder and chat components for building local LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async streams, dependency injection helpers, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Kubernetes: GPU node selector, PVC, autoscaling, ingress.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + llama-index + Chroma; ingests PDFs and answers questions offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images (via SD) and remembers context per channel.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client with context cancellations, SSE streaming, and generics-based helpers.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and CUDA drivers; enables reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose stacks: CPU-only, NVIDIA, AMD ROCm, and Open-WebUI combo ready to clone & run.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeGemma, etc.; includes quantization and system prompts.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with Tokio streams and serde types; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless + scratch container images for Ollama reducing attack surface and image size ~70 %.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Tutorial repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B with LoRA and import the weights into Ollama.
